评论详情: Fit was perfect and I wear it to work, it's so cute on!

This is a very nice jacket for the price. I only give it a 4 because it did not come with the string to lace it up in the back. That can easily be replaced so I did not send back. It's a nice fit. Decent material. Nice color.
Perfect for my Halloween costume, would not recommend anything other than a costume due to the construction and type of fabric. Very lightweight
The fabric is a lot bit thin but works perfect for my costume this Halloween highly recommended 😁
The fabric isn't the most sturdy, but I wasnt expecting it to be. Design is nice. It fits are described and will work well for the intended use of a Halloween costume.
Beautiful coat.  Fabric is either thin, but looked beautiful on stage for my Mary Poppins
This jacket is really cute.  Im 5'6 120 and I ordered a small. It fit fine everywhere but it was large in the girl area haha.
I like the design, but the fabric looks a bit cheap so I’ll probably only use it for costumes. Also, the ribbon that was supposed to be on the back was missing.

This arrived just in time to complete my costume. (I’m a Transylvanian from Rocky Horror) Here’s what you should know… I ordered size small (I wear size 2/4) and it fit just right with the button undone. Buttoned it would have restricted my arm/shoulder movement. I ran the lacing in the back but didn’t use it to cinch. The fabric is definitely cheap costume polyester. Overall I’m happy with the purchase because it makes the outfit (and covered my tush).

There's a hole in the seam in the back. Also there is 5 tabs one on side and 2 on the other so there is no way I can even lace up the back. This was a waste of money and now I have to try and make it work for a costume.not happy with this at all!
This is made out of cheap material like the kind kids Halloween costumes are made of,  not a real jacket. Not worth the price

I had bought this one in the size before xxl it was too small. This one seems too big, but it will do. I am sure even though it is big it can shrink. I love that it goes well with the skirt. Honestly it is nice and good for what you pay for.
The white is a dingy, yellow color. Not sure about the fit. I didn’t take it out of the package.
Beautiful!! But you must wash before wear. It does have a weird smell as soon as it come out of packaging. Material is a bit thin but very beautiful nonetheless

I was very disappointed. Go up a size . I tried it on. Put bag in bag and set back next day. Material is weird. Like a swish every time you more. Refund was fast. I wouldn't waste my money unless you using it for a Halloween party or just once. Price is over rated.
My wife likes the jacket and the way it fits her.
Passform ist gut. Der Stoff glänzt leider sehr.
